comment.body: Perhaps you visited `http://127.0.0.1:43110/gitcenter.bit/repo/?19CM81jc5cefjmWJp4ZJRpGaJZbSBYx2Ng`. Instead, you should visit `http://127.0.0.1:43110/19CM81jc5cefjmWJp4ZJRpGaJZbSBYx2Ng`.
I just visited the link from the previous post and got such error. Then I visited `http://127.0.0.1:43110/19CM81jc5cefjmWJp4ZJRpGaJZbSBYx2Ng` and everything was fine.
I've added some hacks to make `http://127.0.0.1:43110/gitcenter.bit/repo/?19CM81jc5cefjmWJp4ZJRpGaJZbSBYx2Ng` also work, but maybe it won't work for some repositories.
